Question
========

A person achieves a score of 9.3 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 7.8 with a standard deviation 4.3. The z-score of the person with 9.3 correct is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* -0.55
* -0.15
* 0.35

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

-0.55: Incorrect
-0.15: Incorrect
* 0.35: Correct
